controller

Class ViewMapControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ViewMapControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ViewMapControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The mouse controller on viewport panel. Responsible for the interaction with the 2D map visualization in the viewport via mouse
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

    • Field Summary

      static boolean saveState 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewMapControl(javax.swing.JScrollPane scrollPane, Tileset tileset, MapState mapStates)
      Creates the adapter for mouse interactions and its callbacks adding it to the scrollPane as a mouse and a motion listener

        public static boolean saveState

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewMapControl

        public ViewMapControl(javax.swing.JScrollPane scrollPane,
                      Tileset tileset,
                      MapState mapStates)
        Creates the adapter for mouse interactions and its callbacks adding it to the scrollPane as a mouse and a motion listener
        Parameters:
        scrollPane - JScrollPane that contains the viewport for map visualization
        tileset - the current tileset loaded
        mapStates - the map states that represents the 2d map in different states (multiple states for undoing and redoing operations)
